title: Announcement, Of Light/ Primitive Processes: Dorothy Potter Barnett, Daniel G. Pohlman, Jack O. Summers, 1989
title_raw: Of Light/ Primitive Processes: Dorothy Potter Barnett, Daniel G. Pohlman, Jack O. Summers
signed:
Signature imprinted in maroon ink across lower center: Design: Edwar dd Fella, Of Wind/* Polished Practices.  

* The "/" is included in the text.
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in maroon across upper half of sheet: Of Light/* Primitive Processes:/ Dorothy Potter Barnett/ Daniel G. Pohlman/ Jack O. Summers/ October 13-November 11, 1989/ Sponshorship of Artists:/ Seaman Paper Adray Appliance Photo & SoundCenter/ AIN Plastic/ O'Leary/ Paint Calumet Photo graphic/ Koenig Art ist Supplies/ Graphic Systems Supply; at center left edge: Curator:/ Carlos/ Diaz/ Gallery/ Ta lk :/ B ill/ Rauhauser; up lower left edge, sideways: Saturday, October 28th - 2:00p.m.; across lower third of sheet: DetroitFocus Gallery/ 743Beaubien, 3rd Floor/ Hours:Wednesday--Saturday,/ Noon-6: 00pm/ Phone : (313)962-9 0 25/ Detroit, Michigan 48226/ Opening Reception :Friday, Oct-/ ober13th 5:00-7:30p.m./ OpeningReception 5:00-7:30/ At the Detroit/ Artists Market- Michigan/ Connection/ Susan Sontag Lecture at the Detroit Institute of Arts, 8p.m./ Oct ober 13 November 10 
Verso: Imprinted in maroon, right edge, lower center: Non-Profit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit, Michigan/ permit Number 2960; In lower left corner: Across from the Bricktown People MoverStation/ Det roit Focus Gallery/ 743 Beubien, 3rd Floor Detroit,Michigan/ 48226 With Support from/ Michigan Council for the Arts/ National Endowment for the Arts/ DetroitCouncil of the Arts

* The "/" is included in the text.
description:
Poster announcement printed in maroon ink for event at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed. 

Recto: Text in various sizes giving event title, artists, dates, sponsors, curator, address, and additional information.  

Verso: Across upper half: image of wine bottle, glass tumbler, hand holding paper, tea kettle.  Image of lightbulb above them.  Lower half: text with sponsors, mailing and additonal information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Of Light/ Primitive Processes: Dorothy Potter Barnett, Daniel G. Pohlman, Jack O. Summers, 1989. Offset lithograph on cream paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-52
